name: WordFall - Brain Training Game to Search Words
name_original: WordFall - Brain Training Game to Search Words
description:
Search the word, swipe it and beat 500+ word puzzles!

Challenge your vocabulary and be the word genius right now! In WordFall, each puzzle contains a number of words on a fixed theme: fruits, animals, movies and etc. Find the word up from all these messed up letters and swipe it. The letters then disappear and the remaining ones fall down to form new words.

FEATURES
√ ENJOY ease and fun.
√ ENRICH your word vocabulary.
√ PLAY with cute and delightful images.
√ GET hints to help you through tough levels.
√ CONNECT with game center to show off your achievements.
